00019 // from strategic
00020 extern INT16 DirXIncrementer[8];
00021 extern INT16 DirYIncrementer[8];
00022 //
00023 // CJC's DG->JA2 conversion notes
00024 //
00025 // LegalNPCDestination - mode hardcoded to walking; C.O. tear gas related stuff commented out
00026 // TryToResumeMovement - C.O. EscortedMoveCanceled call
00027 // GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards - C.O. stuff related to current animation esp first aid
00028 // SetCivilianDestination - C.O. stuff for if we don't control the civ
00029 
00030 int LegalNPCDestination(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridno, UINT8 ubPathMode, UINT8 ubWaterOK, UINT8 fFlags)
00031 {
00032       BOOLEAN fSkipTilesWithMercs;
00033  
00034       if ((sGridno < 0) || (sGridno >= GRIDSIZE))
00035   {
00036 #ifdef RECORDNET
00037    fprintf(NetDebugFile,"LegalNPC->sDestination: ERROR - rcvd invalid gridno %d",gridno);
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00041    NumMessage("LegalNPC->sDestination: ERROR - rcvd invalid gridno ",gridno);
00042 #endif
00043 
00044    return(FALSE);
00045   }
00046 
00047       // return false if gridno on different level from merc
00048       if ( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( pSoldier->sGridNo ) && gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].sHeight != gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].sHeight )
00049       {
00050             return( FALSE );
00051       }
00052 
00053 
00054       // skip mercs if turnbased and adjacent AND not doing an IGNORE_PATH check (which is used almost exclusively by GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards)
00055       fSkipTilesWithMercs = (gfTurnBasedAI && ubPathMode != IGNORE_PATH && SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridno ) == 1 );
00056 
00057  // if this gridno is an OK destination
00058  // AND the gridno is NOT in a tear-gassed tile when we have no gas mask
00059  // AND someone is NOT already standing there
00060  // AND we're NOT already standing at that gridno
00061  // AND the gridno hasn't been black-listed for us
00062 
00063  // Nov 28 98: skip people in destination tile if in turnbased
00064  if ( ( NewOKDestination(pSoldier, sGridno, fSkipTilesWithMercs, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) &&
00065                         ( !InGas( pSoldier, sGridno ) ) &&
00066                         ( sGridno != pSoldier->sGridNo ) &&
00067                         ( sGridno != pSoldier->sBlackList ) )
00068  /*
00069  if ( ( NewOKDestination(pSoldier, sGridno, FALSE, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) &&
00070                         ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].ubExtFlags[0] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE | MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) || ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == GASMASK || pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == GASMASK ) ) &&
00071                         ( sGridno != pSoldier->sGridNo ) &&
00072                         ( sGridno != pSoldier->sBlackList ) )*/
00073  /*
00074  if ( ( NewOKDestination(pSoldier,sGridno,ALLPEOPLE, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) &&
00075                         ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ sGridno ].ubExtFlags[0] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE | MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) || ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == GASMASK || pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == GASMASK ) ) &&
00076                         ( sGridno != pSoldier->sGridNo ) &&
00077                         ( sGridno != pSoldier->sBlackList ) )
00078                         */
00079    {
00080     
00081         // if water's a problem, and gridno is in a water tile (bridges are OK)
00082             if (!ubWaterOK && Water(sGridno))
00083               return(FALSE);
00084 
00085             //Madd: added to prevent people from running into gas and fire
00086             if ( (gpWorldLevelData[sGridno].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS)) &&
00087                               FindGasMask(pSoldier) == NO_SLOT  )
00088             {
00089                   return( FALSE );
00090             }
00091             if ( gpWorldLevelData[sGridno].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS )
00092             {
00093                   return( FALSE );
00094             }
00095 
00096 
00097     // passed all checks, now try to make sure we can get there!
00098     switch (ubPathMode)
00099      {
00100       // if finding a path wasn't asked for (could have already been done,
00101       // for example), don't bother
00102       case IGNORE_PATH     :  return(TRUE);
00103 
00104       case ENSURE_PATH     :  if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridno, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, COPYROUTE, fFlags ) )
00105                                                                                           {
00106                                                                                           return(TRUE);        // legal destination
00107                                                                                           }
00108                                                                               else // got this far, but found no clear path,
00109                                                                                           {
00110                                                                                                 // so test fails
00111                                                                               return(FALSE);
00112                                                                                           }
00113                                                                                           // *** NOTE: movement mode hardcoded to WALKING !!!!!
00114                   case ENSURE_PATH_COST:  return(PlotPath(pSoldier,sGridno,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,WALKING,FALSE,FALSE,0));
00115 
00116       default              :
00117 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00118                        NumMessage("LegalNPC->sDestination: ERROR - illegal pathMode = ",ubPathMode);
00119 #endif
00120                        return(FALSE);
00121      }
00122    }
00123  else  // something failed - didn't even have to test path
00124    return(FALSE);             // illegal destination
00125 }

00129 
00130 int TryToResumeMovement(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridno)
00131 {
00132       UINT8 ubGottaCancel = FALSE;
00133       UINT8 ubSuccess = FALSE;
00134 
00135 
00136       // have to make sure the old destination is still legal (somebody may
00137       // have occupied the destination gridno in the meantime!)
00138       if (LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sGridno,ENSURE_PATH,WATEROK,0))
00139       {
00140 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00141             STR tempstr;
00142             sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr, "%d CONTINUES MOVEMENT to gridno %d...\n", pSoldier->ubID,sGridno );
00143             DebugAI( tempstr );
00144 #endif
00145 
00146             pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE; // optimization - Ian
00147 
00148             // make him go to it (needed to continue movement across multiple turns)
00149             NewDest(pSoldier,sGridno);
00150 
00151             ubSuccess = TRUE;
00152        
00153             // make sure that it worked (check that pSoldier->sDestination == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00154             if (pSoldier->sDestination == sGridno)
00155             {
00156                   ubSuccess = TRUE;
00157             }
00158             else
00159             {
00160 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00161                   sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"TryToResumeMovement: ERROR - NewDest failed for %s, action CANCELED",pSoldier->name);
00162 
00163 #ifdef RECORDNET
00164                   fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\n\t%s\n",tempstr);
00165 #endif
00166 
00167                   PopMessage(tempstr);
00168                   SaveGame(ERROR_SAVE);
00169 #endif
00170 
00171                   // must work even for escorted civs, can't just set the flag
00172                   CancelAIAction(pSoldier,FORCE);
00173             }
00174 
00175   }
00176  else
00177   {
00178             // don't black-list anything here, this situation can come up quite
00179             // legally if another soldier gets in the way between turns
00180 
00181 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00182             sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"TryToResumeMovement: %d can't continue to gridno %d, no longer legal!",pSoldier->ubID,gridno);
00183 
00184 #ifdef RECORDNET
00185             fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\n\t%s\n",tempstr);
00186 #endif
00187 
00188 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00189             AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00190 #endif
00191 
00192 #endif
00193 
00194 
00195             if (!pSoldier->bUnderEscort)
00196             {
00197                   CancelAIAction(pSoldier,DONTFORCE); // no need to force this
00198             }
00199             else
00200             {
00201                   // this is an escorted NPC, don't want to just completely stop
00202                   // moving, try to find a nearby "next best" destination if possible
00203                   pSoldier->usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier,sGridno,pSoldier->bAction);
00204 
00205                   // if it's not possible to get any closer
00206                   if (pSoldier->usActionData == NOWHERE)
00207                   {
00208                         ubGottaCancel = TRUE;
00209                   }
00210                   else
00211                   {
00212                         // change his desired destination to this new one
00213                         sGridno = pSoldier->usActionData;
00214 
00215                         // GoAsFar... sets pathStored TRUE only if he could go all the way
00216 
00217                         // make him go to it (needed to continue movement across multiple turns)
00218                         NewDest(pSoldier,sGridno);
00219 
00220 
00221                         // make sure that it worked (check that pSoldier->sDestination == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00222                         if (pSoldier->sDestination == sGridno)
00223                               ubSuccess = TRUE;
00224                         else
00225                               ubGottaCancel = TRUE;
00226                   }
00227 
00228                   if (ubGottaCancel)
00229                   {
00230                         // can't get close, gotta abort the movement!
00231                         CancelAIAction(pSoldier,FORCE);
00232 
00233                         // tell the player doing the escorting that civilian has stopped
00234                         //EscortedMoveCanceled(pSoldier,COMMUNICATE);
00235                   }
00236             }
00237       }
00238 
00239       return(ubSuccess);
00240 }

00243 
00244 INT16 NextPatrolPoint(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00245 {
00246  // patrol slot 0 is UNUSED, so max patrolCnt is actually only 9
00247  if ((pSoldier->bPatrolCnt < 1) || (pSoldier->bPatrolCnt >= MAXPATROLGRIDS))
00248   {
00249 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00250    sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"NextPatrolPoint: ERROR: Invalid patrol count = %d for %s",pSoldier->bPatrolCnt,pSoldier->name);
00251    PopMessage(tempstr);
00252 #endif
00253 
00254    return(NOWHERE);
00255   }
00256 
00257  
00258  pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt++;
00259 
00260  
00261  // if there are no more patrol points, return back to the first one
00262  if (pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt > pSoldier->bPatrolCnt)
00263       pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt = 1;   // ZERO is not used!
00264 
00265  return(pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt]);
00266 }

00269 
00270 INT8 PointPatrolAI(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00271 {
00272  INT16 sPatrolPoint;
00273  INT8  bOldOrders;
00274 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00275  STR16 tempstr;
00276 #endif
00277 
00278  sPatrolPoint = pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt];
00279 
00280  // if we're already there, advance next patrol point
00281  if (pSoldier->sGridNo == sPatrolPoint || pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt == 0)
00282   {
00283    // find next valid patrol point
00284    do
00285     {
00286      sPatrolPoint = NextPatrolPoint(pSoldier);
00287     }
00288    while ((sPatrolPoint != NOWHERE) && (NewOKDestination(pSoldier,sPatrolPoint,IGNOREPEOPLE, pSoldier->bLevel) < 1));
00289 
00290    // if we're back where we started, then ALL other patrol points are junk!
00291    if (pSoldier->sGridNo == sPatrolPoint)
00292     {
00293 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00294      NumMessage("PROBLEM WITH SCENARIO: All other patrol points are invalid for guynum ",pSoldier->ubID);
00295 #endif
00296      // force change of orders & an abort
00297      sPatrolPoint = NOWHERE;
00298     }
00299   }
00300 
00301  // if we don't have a legal patrol point
00302  if (sPatrolPoint == NOWHERE)
00303   {
00304 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00305    NumMessage("PointPatrolAI: ERROR - no legal patrol point for %d",pSoldier->ubID);
00306 #endif
00307 
00308    // over-ride orders to something safer
00309    pSoldier->bOrders = FARPATROL;
00310    return(FALSE);
00311   }
00312 
00313 
00314  // make sure we can get there from here at this time, if we can't get all
00315  // the way there, at least do our best to get close
00316  if (LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sPatrolPoint,ENSURE_PATH,WATEROK,0))
00317   {
00318    pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE;        // optimization - Ian
00319    pSoldier->usActionData = sPatrolPoint;
00320   }
00321  else
00322   {
00323    // temporarily extend roaming range to infinity by changing orders, else
00324    // this won't work if the next patrol point is > 10 tiles away!
00325    bOldOrders                             = pSoldier->bOrders;
00326    pSoldier->bOrders    = ONCALL;
00327 
00328    pSoldier->usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier,sPatrolPoint,pSoldier->bAction);
00329 
00330    pSoldier->bOrders = bOldOrders;
00331 
00332    // if it's not possible to get any closer, that's OK, but fail this call
00333    if (pSoldier->usActionData == NOWHERE)
00334      return(FALSE);
00335   }
00336 
00337 
00338  // passed all tests - start moving towards next patrol point
00339 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00340  sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - POINT PATROL to grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00341  AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00342 #endif
00343 
00344  return(TRUE);
00345 }
00346 
00347 INT8 RandomPointPatrolAI(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00348 {
00349 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00350  STR16 tempstr;
00351 #endif
00352       INT16 sPatrolPoint;
00353       INT8  bOldOrders, bPatrolIndex;
00354       INT8  bCnt;
00355 
00356       sPatrolPoint = pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt];
00357 
00358       // if we're already there, advance next patrol point
00359       if (pSoldier->sGridNo == sPatrolPoint || pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt == 0)
00360       {
00361             // find next valid patrol point
00362             // we keep a count of the # of times we are in here to make sure we don't get into an endless
00363             //loop
00364             bCnt = 0;
00365             do
00366             {
00367                   // usPatrolGrid[0] gets used for centre of close etc patrols, so we have to add 1 to the Random #
00368                   bPatrolIndex = (INT8) PreRandom( pSoldier->bPatrolCnt ) + 1;
00369                   sPatrolPoint = pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[ bPatrolIndex];
00370                   bCnt++;
00371             }
00372             while ( (sPatrolPoint == pSoldier->sGridNo) || ( (sPatrolPoint != NOWHERE) && (bCnt < pSoldier->bPatrolCnt) && (NewOKDestination(pSoldier,sPatrolPoint,IGNOREPEOPLE, pSoldier->bLevel ) < 1)) ); 
00373 
00374             if (bCnt == pSoldier->bPatrolCnt)
00375             {
00376                   // ok, we tried doing this randomly, didn't work well, so now do a linear search
00377                   pSoldier->bNextPatrolPnt = 0;
00378                   do
00379                   {
00380                         sPatrolPoint = NextPatrolPoint(pSoldier);
00381                   }
00382                   while ((sPatrolPoint != NOWHERE) && (NewOKDestination(pSoldier,sPatrolPoint,IGNOREPEOPLE, pSoldier->bLevel) < 1));
00383             }
00384             
00385             // do nothing this time around
00386             if (pSoldier->sGridNo == sPatrolPoint)
00387             {
00388                   return( FALSE );
00389             }
00390       }
00391 
00392       // if we don't have a legal patrol point
00393       if (sPatrolPoint == NOWHERE)
00394       {
00395 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00396             NumMessage("PointPatrolAI: ERROR - no legal patrol point for %d",pSoldier->ubID);
00397 #endif
00398 
00399             // over-ride orders to something safer
00400             pSoldier->bOrders = FARPATROL;
00401             return(FALSE);
00402       }
00403 
00404       // make sure we can get there from here at this time, if we can't get all
00405       // the way there, at least do our best to get close
00406       if (LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sPatrolPoint,ENSURE_PATH,WATEROK,0))
00407       {
00408             pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE;     // optimization - Ian
00409             pSoldier->usActionData = sPatrolPoint;
00410       }
00411       else
00412       {
00413             // temporarily extend roaming range to infinity by changing orders, else
00414             // this won't work if the next patrol point is > 10 tiles away!
00415             bOldOrders                          = pSoldier->bOrders;
00416             pSoldier->bOrders = SEEKENEMY;
00417 
00418             pSoldier->usActionData = GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(pSoldier,sPatrolPoint,pSoldier->bAction);
00419 
00420             pSoldier->bOrders = bOldOrders;
00421 
00422             // if it's not possible to get any closer, that's OK, but fail this call
00423             if (pSoldier->usActionData == NOWHERE)
00424                   return(FALSE);
00425       }
00426 
00427 
00428       // passed all tests - start moving towards next patrol point
00429 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00430       sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s - POINT PATROL to grid %d",pSoldier->name,pSoldier->usActionData);
00431       AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00432 #endif
00433 
00434       return(TRUE);
00435 }

00438 
00439 INT16 InternalGoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sDesGrid, INT8 bReserveAPs, INT8 bAction, INT8 fFlags )
00440 {
00441 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00442  STR16 tempstr;
00443 #endif
00444       INT16 sLoop,sAPCost;
00445       INT16 sTempDest,sGoToGrid;
00446       INT16 sOrigin;
00447       UINT16 usMaxDist;
00448       UINT8 ubDirection,ubDirsLeft,ubDirChecked[8],fFound = FALSE;
00449       INT8 bAPsLeft, fPathFlags;
00450       UINT8 ubRoomRequired = 0, ubTempRoom;
00451 
00452       if ( bReserveAPs == -1 )
00453       {
00454             // default reserve points
00455             if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
00456             {
00457                   bReserveAPs = 0;
00458             }
00459             else
00460             {
00461                   bReserveAPs = MAX_AP_CARRIED;
00462             }
00463       }
00464 
00465       sTempDest = -1;
00466 
00467       // obtain maximum roaming distance from soldier's sOrigin
00468       usMaxDist = RoamingRange(pSoldier,&sOrigin);
00469 
00470       if ( pSoldier->bOrders <= CLOSEPATROL && (pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM || pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE ) )
00471       {
00472             if ( InARoom( pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0], &ubRoomRequired ) )
00473             {
00474                   // make sure this doesn't interfere with pathing for scripts
00475                   if ( pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != NOWHERE )
00476                   {
00477                         ubRoomRequired = 0;
00478                   }
00479             }
00480       }
00481 
00482       pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = DetermineMovementMode(pSoldier, bAction );
00483       if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == RUNNING && fFlags & FLAG_CAUTIOUS )
00484       {
00485             pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = WALKING;
00486       }
00487 
00488 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00489       sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s wants to go towards %d (has range %d)",pSoldier->name,sDesGrid,usMaxDist);
00490       AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00491 #endif
00492 
00493       // if soldier is ALREADY at the desired destination, quit right away
00494       if (sDesGrid == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00495       {
00496             return(NOWHERE);
00497       }
00498 
00499       // don't try to approach go after noises or enemies actually in water
00500       // would be too easy to throw rocks in water, etc. & distract the AI
00501       if (Water(sDesGrid))
00502       {
00503             return(NOWHERE);
00504       }
00505 
00506       fPathFlags = 0;
00507       if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
00508       {     /*
00509             if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sDesGrid ) <= PATH_CLOSE_RADIUS )
00510             {
00511                   // then do a limited range path search and see if we can get there
00512                   gubNPCDistLimit = 10;
00513                   if ( !LegalNPCDestination( pSoldier, sDesGrid, ENSURE_PATH, NOWATER, fPathFlags) )
00514                   {
00515                         gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
00516                         return( NOWHERE );
00517                   }
00518                   else
00519                   {
00520                         // allow attempt to path without 'good enough' flag on
00521                         gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
00522                   }
00523             }
00524             else
00525             {
00526             */
00527                   fPathFlags = PATH_CLOSE_GOOD_ENOUGH;
00528             //}
00529       }
00530 
00531       // first step: try to find an OK destination at or near the desired gridno
00532       if (!LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sDesGrid,ENSURE_PATH,NOWATER,fPathFlags))
00533       {
00534 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00535             AIPopMessage((STR16)"destination Grid # itself not valid, looking around it");
00536 #endif
00537             if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
00538             {
00539                   // we tried to get close, failed; abort!
00540                   return( NOWHERE );
00541             }
00542             else
00543             {
00544                   // else look at the 8 nearest gridnos to sDesGrid for a valid destination
00545 
00546                   // clear ubDirChecked flag for all 8 directions
00547                   for (ubDirection = 0; ubDirection < 8; ubDirection++)
00548                         ubDirChecked[ubDirection] = FALSE;
00549 
00550                   ubDirsLeft = 8;
00551 
00552                   // examine all 8 spots around 'sDesGrid'
00553                   // keep looking while directions remain and a satisfactory one not found
00554                   for (ubDirsLeft = 8; ubDirsLeft != 0; ubDirsLeft--)
00555                   {
00556                         if (fFound)
00557                         {
00558                               break;
00559                         }
00560                         // randomly select a direction which hasn't been 'checked' yet
00561                         do
00562                         {
00563                               ubDirection = (UINT8) Random(8);
00564                         }
00565                         while (ubDirChecked[ubDirection]);
00566 
00567                         ubDirChecked[ubDirection] = TRUE;
00568 
00569                         // determine the gridno 1 tile away from current friend in this direction
00570                         sTempDest = NewGridNo(sDesGrid,DirectionInc( (INT16)(ubDirection + 1) ));
00571 
00572                         // if that's out of bounds, ignore it & check next direction
00573                         if (sTempDest == sDesGrid)
00574                               continue;
00575 
00576                         if (LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sTempDest,ENSURE_PATH,NOWATER,0))
00577                         {
00578                               fFound = TRUE;            // found a spot
00579 
00580 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00581                               AINumMessage("Found a spot!  ubDirection = ",ubDirection + 1);
00582 #endif
00583 
00584                               break;                   // stop checking in other directions
00585                         }
00586                   }
00587 
00588                   if (!fFound)
00589                   {
00590 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00591                         AINumMessage("Couldn't find OK destination around grid #",sDesGrid);
00592 #endif
00593 
00594                         return(NOWHERE);
00595                   }
00596 
00597                   // found a good grid #, this becomes our actual desired grid #
00598                   sDesGrid = sTempDest;
00599             }
00600       }
00601 
00602  // HAVE FOUND AN OK destination AND PLOTTED A VALID BEST PATH TO IT
00603 
00604 
00605 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00606  AINumMessage("Chosen legal destination is gridno ",sDesGrid);
00607  AINumMessage("Tracing along path, pathRouteToGo = ",pSoldier->usPathIndex);
00608 #endif
00609 
00610  sGoToGrid = pSoldier->sGridNo;      // start back where soldier is standing now
00611  sAPCost = 0;                 // initialize path cost counter
00612 
00613  // we'll only go as far along the plotted route as is within our
00614  // permitted roaming range, and we'll stop as soon as we're down to <= 5 APs
00615 
00616  for (sLoop = 0; sLoop < (pSoldier->usPathDataSize - pSoldier->usPathIndex); sLoop++)
00617   {
00618    // what is the next gridno in the path?
00619 
00620        //sTempDest = NewGridNo( sGoToGrid,DirectionInc( (INT16) (pSoldier->usPathingData[sLoop] + 1) ) );
00621        sTempDest = NewGridNo( sGoToGrid,DirectionInc( (INT16) (pSoldier->usPathingData[sLoop]) ) );
00622    //NumMessage("sTempDest = ",sTempDest);
00623 
00624    // this should NEVER be out of bounds
00625    if (sTempDest == sGoToGrid)
00626     {
00627 #ifdef BETAVERSION
00628      sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards: ERROR - gridno along valid route is invalid!  guynum %d, sTempDest = %d",pSoldier->ubID,sTempDest);
00629 
00630 #ifdef RECORDNET
00631      fprintf(NetDebugFile,"\n\t%s\n",tempstr);
00632 #endif
00633 
00634      PopMessage(tempstr);
00635      SaveGame(ERROR_SAVE);
00636 #endif
00637 
00638      break;           // quit here, sGoToGrid is where we are going
00639     }
00640 
00641    // if this takes us beyond our permitted "roaming range"
00642    if (SpacesAway(sOrigin,sTempDest) > usMaxDist)
00643      break;           // quit here, sGoToGrid is where we are going
00644 
00645 
00646        if ( ubRoomRequired )
00647        {
00648             if ( !( InARoom( sTempDest, &ubTempRoom ) && ubTempRoom == ubRoomRequired ) )
00649             {
00650              // quit here, limited by room!
00651              break;
00652             }
00653        }
00654 
00655    if ( (fFlags & FLAG_STOPSHORT) && SpacesAway( sDesGrid, sTempDest ) <= STOPSHORTDIST )
00656        {
00657      break;           // quit here, sGoToGrid is where we are going
00658        }
00659 
00660    // if this gridno is NOT a legal NPC destination
00661    // DONT'T test path again - that would replace the traced path! - Ian
00662    // NOTE: It's OK to go *THROUGH* water to try and get to the destination!
00663    if (!LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,sTempDest,IGNORE_PATH,WATEROK,0))
00664      break;           // quit here, sGoToGrid is where we are going
00665 
00666 
00667    // CAN'T CALL PathCost() HERE! IT CALLS findBestPath() and overwrites
00668    //       pathRouteToGo !!!  Gotta calculate the cost ourselves - Ian
00669    //
00670    //ubAPsLeft = pSoldier->bActionPoints - PathCost(pSoldier,sTempDest,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE);
00671 
00672        if (gfTurnBasedAI)
00673        {
00674              // if we're just starting the "costing" process (first gridno)
00675              if (sLoop == 0)
00676                   {
00677                   /*
00678                    // first, add any additional costs - such as intermediate animations, etc.
00679                    switch(pSoldier->anitype[pSoldier->anim])
00680                         {
00681                          // in theory, no NPC should ever be in one of these animations as
00682                          // things stand (they don't medic anyone), but leave it for robustness
00683                          case START_AID   :
00684                          case GIVING_AID  : sAnimCost = AP_STOP_FIRST_AID;
00685                               break;
00686 
00687                          case TWISTOMACH  :
00688                          case COLLAPSED   : sAnimCost = AP_GET_UP;
00689                               break;
00690 
00691                          case TWISTBACK   :
00692                          case UNCONSCIOUS : sAnimCost = (AP_ROLL_OVER + AP_GET_UP);
00693                               break;
00694 
00695                          default          : sAnimCost = 0;
00696                         }
00697 
00698                    // this is our first cost
00699                    sAPCost += sAnimCost;
00700                    */
00701 
00702                    if (pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == RUNNING)
00703                    {
00704                         sAPCost += AP_START_RUN_COST;
00705                    }
00706                   }
00707 
00708              // ATE: Direction here?
00709              sAPCost += EstimateActionPointCost( pSoldier, sTempDest, (INT8) pSoldier->usPathingData[sLoop], pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, (INT8) sLoop, (INT8) pSoldier->usPathDataSize );
00710 
00711              bAPsLeft = pSoldier->bActionPoints - sAPCost;
00712        }
00713 
00714        // if after this, we have <= 5 APs remaining, that's far enough, break out
00715        // (the idea is to preserve APs so we can crouch or react if
00716        // necessary, and benefit from the carry-over next turn if not needed)
00717        // This routine is NOT used by any GREEN AI, so such caution is warranted!
00718 
00719        if ( gfTurnBasedAI && (bAPsLeft < bReserveAPs) )
00720              break;
00721        else
00722             {
00723              sGoToGrid = sTempDest;    // we're OK up to here
00724 
00725              // if exactly 5 APs left, don't bother checking any further
00726              if ( gfTurnBasedAI && (bAPsLeft == bReserveAPs) )
00727                    break;
00728             }           
00729   }
00730 
00731 
00732  // if it turned out we couldn't go even 1 tile towards the desired gridno
00733  if (sGoToGrid == pSoldier->sGridNo)
00734   {
00735 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00736    sprintf((CHAR *)tempstr,"%s will go NOWHERE, path doesn't meet criteria",pSoldier->name);
00737    AIPopMessage(tempstr);
00738 #endif
00739 
00740    return(NOWHERE);             // then go nowhere
00741   }
00742  else
00743   {
00744    // possible optimization - stored path IS good if we're going all the way
00745    if (sGoToGrid == sDesGrid)
00746        {
00747      pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE;
00748              pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sGoToGrid;
00749        }
00750        else if ( pSoldier->usPathIndex == 0 )
00751        {
00752             // we can hack this surely! -- CJC
00753      pSoldier->bPathStored = TRUE; 
00754              pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sGoToGrid;
00755              pSoldier->usPathDataSize = sLoop + 1;
00756        }
00757 
00758 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00759             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"%d to %d with %d APs left", pSoldier->ubID, sGoToGrid, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
00760  #endif
00761 
00762 
00763             return( sGoToGrid );
00764   }
00765 }
00766                                                             
00767 INT16 GoAsFarAsPossibleTowards(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sDesGrid, INT8 bAction)
00768 {
00769       return( InternalGoAsFarAsPossibleTowards( pSoldier, sDesGrid, -1, bAction, 0 ) );
00770 }
00771       
00772 void SoldierTriesToContinueAlongPath(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00773 {
00774       INT16 usNewGridNo,bAPCost;
00775 
00776 
00777       // turn off the flag now that we're going to do something about it...
00778       // ATE: USed to be redundent, now if called befroe NewDest can cause some side efects...
00779       // AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
00780 
00781       if (pSoldier->bNewSituation == IS_NEW_SITUATION)
00782       {
00783             CancelAIAction(pSoldier,DONTFORCE);
00784             return;
00785       }
00786 
00787       if (pSoldier->usActionData >= NOWHERE)
00788       {
00789             CancelAIAction(pSoldier,DONTFORCE); 
00790             return;
00791       }
00792 
00793       if (!NewOKDestination( pSoldier,pSoldier->usActionData, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ))
00794       {
00795             CancelAIAction(pSoldier,DONTFORCE);
00796             return;
00797       }
00798 
00799       if (IsActionAffordable(pSoldier))
00800       {
00801             if (pSoldier->bActionInProgress == FALSE)
00802             {
00803                   // start a move that didn't even get started before...
00804                   // hope this works...
00805                   NPCDoesAct(pSoldier);
00806 
00807                   // perform the chosen action
00808                   pSoldier->bActionInProgress = ExecuteAction(pSoldier); // if started, mark us as busy
00809             }
00810             else
00811             {
00812                   // otherwise we shouldn't have to do anything(?)
00813             }
00814       }
00815       else
00816       {
00817             CancelAIAction(pSoldier,DONTFORCE);
00818 #ifdef TESTAI
00819             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2AI, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
00820                                     String("Soldier (%d) HAS NOT ENOUGH AP to continue along path",pSoldier->ubID) );
00821 #endif
00822       }
00823 
00824       usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) );
00825 
00826       // Find out how much it takes to move here!
00827       bAPCost = EstimateActionPointCost( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, (INT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, (INT8) pSoldier->usPathIndex, (INT8) pSoldier->usPathDataSize );
00828 
00829       if (pSoldier->bActionPoints >= bAPCost)
00830       {
00831             // seems to have enough points...
00832             NewDest(pSoldier,usNewGridNo);
00833             // maybe we didn't actually start the action last turn...
00834             pSoldier->bActionInProgress = TRUE;
00835 #ifdef TESTAI
00836             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2AI, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
00837                                     String("Soldier (%d) continues along path",pSoldier->ubID) );
00838 #endif
00839       }
00840       else
00841        {
00842             CancelAIAction(pSoldier,DONTFORCE);
00843 #ifdef TESTAI
00844             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2AI, DBG_LEVEL_3, 
00845                                     String("Soldier (%d) HAS NOT ENOUGH AP to continue along path",pSoldier->ubID) );
00846 #endif
00847        }
00848 }                                                                 
00849                                                                         
00850 void HaltMoveForSoldierOutOfPoints(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
00851 {
00852       // If a special move, ignore this!
00853       if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
00854       {
00855             return;
00856       }
00857 
00858       // record that this merc can no longer animate and why...
00859       AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, TRUE );
00860 
00861       // We'll keep his action intact though...
00862       DebugAI( (STR)String("NO AP TO FINISH MOVE for %d (%d APs left)",pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->bActionPoints) );
00863 
00864       // if this dude is under AI right now, then pass the baton to someone else
00865       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL)
00866       {
00867             #ifdef TESTAICONTROL
00868                   DebugAI( (STR)String("Ending turn for %d because out of APs for movement", pSoldier->ubID ) );
00869             #endif
00870 
00871             EndAIGuysTurn(pSoldier);
00872       }
00873 }

00921 }

00923 
00924 #define RADIUS 3
00925 
00926 INT16 TrackScent( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00927 {
00928       // This function returns the best gridno to go to based on the scent being followed,
00929       // and the soldier (creature/animal)'s current direction (which is used to resolve
00930       // ties.
00931       INT32                               iXDiff, iYDiff, iXIncr;
00932       INT32                               iStart, iXStart, iYStart;
00933       INT32                               iGridNo;
00934       INT8                                bDir;
00935       INT32                               iBestGridNo = NOWHERE;
00936       UINT8                               ubBestDirDiff = 5, ubBestStrength = 0;
00937       UINT8                               ubDirDiff, ubStrength;
00938       UINT8                               ubSoughtSmell;
00939       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
00940 
00941       iStart = pSoldier->sGridNo;
00942       iXStart = iStart % WORLD_COLS;
00943       iYStart = iStart / WORLD_COLS;
00944 
00945       if (CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) ) // or bloodcats
00946       {
00947             // tracking humans; search the edges of a 7x7 square for the 
00948             // most promising tile
00949             ubSoughtSmell = HUMAN;
00950             for (iYDiff = -RADIUS; iYDiff < (RADIUS + 1); iYDiff++)
00951             {
00952                   if (iYStart + iYDiff < 0)
00953                   {
00954                         // outside of map! might be on map further down...
00955                         continue;
00956                   }
00957                   else if (iYStart + iYDiff > WORLD_ROWS)
00958                   {
00959                         // outside of bottom of map! abort!
00960                         break;
00961                   }
00962                   if (iYDiff == -RADIUS || iYDiff == RADIUS)
00963                   {
00964                         iXIncr = 1;
00965                   }
00966                   else
00967                   {
00968                         // skip over the spots in the centre of the square
00969                         iXIncr = RADIUS * 2;
00970                   }
00971                   for (iXDiff = -RADIUS; iXDiff < (RADIUS + 1); iXDiff += iXIncr)
00972                   {
00973                         iGridNo = iStart + iXDiff + iYDiff * WORLD_ROWS;
00974                         if (abs( iGridNo % WORLD_ROWS - iXStart ) > RADIUS)
00975                         {
00976                               // wrapped across map!
00977                               continue;
00978                         }
00979                         if (LegalNPCDestination(pSoldier,pSoldier->usActionData,ENSURE_PATH,WATEROK,0))
00980                         {
00981                               // check this location out
00982                               pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[iGridNo]);
00983                               if (pMapElement->ubSmellInfo && (SMELL_TYPE( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo ) == ubSoughtSmell))
00984                               {
00985                                     ubStrength = SMELL_STRENGTH( pMapElement->ubSmellInfo );
00986                                     if (ubStrength > ubBestStrength )
00987                                     {
00988                                           iBestGridNo = iGridNo;
00989                                           ubBestStrength = ubStrength;
00990                                           bDir = atan8( (INT16) iXStart, (INT16) iYStart, (INT16) (iXStart + iXDiff), (INT16) (iYStart + iYDiff) );
00991                                           // now convert it into a difference in degree between it and our current dir
00992                                           ubBestDirDiff = abs( pSoldier->bDirection - bDir );
00993                                           if (ubBestDirDiff > 4 ) // dir 0 compared with dir 6, for instance
00994                                           {
00995                                                 ubBestDirDiff = 8 - ubBestDirDiff;
00996                                           }
00997                                     }
00998                                     else if (ubStrength == ubBestStrength)
00999                                     {
01000                                           if (iBestGridNo == NOWHERE)
01001                                           {
01002                                                 // first place we've found with the same strength
01003                                                 iBestGridNo = iGridNo;
01004                                                 ubBestStrength = ubStrength;
01005                                           }
01006                                           else
01007                                           {
01008                                                 // use directions to decide between the two
01009                                                 // start by calculating direction to the new gridno
01010                                                 bDir = atan8( (INT16) iXStart, (INT16) iYStart, (INT16) (iXStart + iXDiff), (INT16) (iYStart + iYDiff) );
01011                                                 // now convert it into a difference in degree between it and our current dir
01012                                                 ubDirDiff = abs( pSoldier->bDirection - bDir );
01013                                                 if (ubDirDiff > 4 ) // dir 0 compared with dir 6, for instance
01014                                                 {
01015                                                       ubDirDiff = 8 - ubDirDiff;
01016                                                 }
01017                                                 if (ubDirDiff < ubBestDirDiff || ((ubDirDiff == ubBestDirDiff) && Random( 2 )))
01018                                                 {
01019                                                       // follow this trail as its closer to the one we're following!
01020                                                       // (in the case of a tie, we tossed a coin)
01021                                                       ubBestDirDiff = ubDirDiff;
01022 
01023                                                 }
01024                                           }
01025                                     }     
01026                               }
01027                         }
01028                   }
01029                   // go on to next tile
01030             }
01031             // go on to next row
01032       }
01033       else
01034       {
01035             // who else can track? 
01036       }
01037       if (iBestGridNo != NOWHERE )
01038       {
01039             pSoldier->usActionData = (INT16) iBestGridNo;
01040             return( (INT16) iBestGridNo );
01041       }
01042       return( 0 );
01043 }
01044 
01045 /*
01046 UINT16 RunAway( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
01047 {
01048       // "Run away! Run away!!!"
01049       // This code should figure out which directions are safe for the enemy
01050       // to run in.  They shouldn't try to run off in directions which will
01051       // take them into enemy territory.  We must presume that they inform each
01052       // other by radio when sectors are taken by the player! :-)
01053       // The second wrinkle would be to look at the directions to known player
01054       // mercs and use that to influence the direction in which we run.
01055 
01056       // we can only flee in the cardinal directions (NESW) so start with an
01057       // alternating pattern of true/false
01058       INT8 bOkayDir[8] = {TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE};
01059       UINT8 ubLoop, ubBestDir, ubDistToEdge, ubBestDistToEdge = WORLD_COLS;
01060       INT32 iSector, iSectorX, iSectorY;
01061       INT32 iNewSectorX, iNewSectorY, iNewSector;
01062       INT32 iRunX, iRunY, iRunGridNo;
01063       SOLDIERTYPE * pOpponent;
01064       
01065       iSector = pSoldier->sSectorX + pSoldier->sSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X;
01066 
01067       // first start by scanning through opposing mercs and find out what directions are blocked.
01068       for (ubLoop = 0,pOpponent = Menptr; ubLoop < MAXMERCS; ubLoop++,pOpponent++)
01069       {
01070             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
01071             if (!pOpponent->bActive || !pOpponent->bInSector || !pOpponent->bLife)
01072             {
01073                   continue;          // next merc
01074             }
01075 
01076             // if this man is neutral / on the same side, he's not an opponent
01077             if (pOpponent->bNeutral || (pSoldier->bSide == pOpponent->bSide))
01078             {
01079                   continue;          // next merc
01080             }
01081             
01082             // we don't want to run in that direction!
01083             bOkayDir[ atan8( pSoldier->sX, pSoldier->sY, pOpponent->sX, pOpponent->sY ) ] = FALSE;
01084       }
01085 
01086       for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < 8; ubLoop += 2)
01087       {
01088             if (bOkayDir[ubLoop])
01089             {
01090                   // figure out sector # in that direction
01091                   iNewSectorX = pSoldier->sSectorX + DirXIncrementer[ubLoop];
01092                   iNewSectorY = pSoldier->sSectorY + DirYIncrementer[ubLoop];
01093                   iNewSector = iSectorX + iSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X;
01094                   // check movement
01095                   if (TravelBetweenSectorsIsBlockedFromFoot( (UINT16) iSector, (UINT16) iNewSector ) || StrategicMap[iSector].fEnemyControlled)
01096                   {
01097                         // sector inaccessible or controlled by the player; skip it!
01098                         continue;
01099                   }
01100                   switch( ubLoop )
01101                   {
01102                         case 0:
01103                               ubDistToEdge = pSoldier->sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
01104                               break;
01105                         case 2:
01106                               ubDistToEdge = WORLD_COLS - pSoldier->sGridNo % WORLD_COLS;
01107                               break;
01108                         case 4:
01109                               ubDistToEdge = WORLD_ROWS - pSoldier->sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
01110                               break;
01111                         case 6:
01112                               ubDistToEdge = pSoldier->sGridNo % WORLD_COLS;
01113                               break;
01114                   }
01115                   if (ubDistToEdge < ubBestDistToEdge)
01116                   {
01117                         ubBestDir = ubLoop;
01118                         ubBestDistToEdge = ubDistToEdge;
01119                   }
01120             }
01121       }
01122       if (ubBestDistToEdge < WORLD_COLS)
01123       {     
01124             switch( ubBestDir )
01125             {
01126                   case 0:
01127                         iRunX = pSoldier->sX + Random( 9 ) - 4;
01128                         iRunY = 0;
01129                         if (iRunX < 0)
01130                         {
01131                               iRunX = 0;
01132                         }
01133                         else if (iRunX >= WORLD_COLS)
01134                         {
01135                               iRunX = WORLD_COLS - 1;
01136                         }
01137                         break;
01138                   case 2:
01139                         iRunX = WORLD_COLS;
01140                         iRunY = pSoldier->sY + Random( 9 ) - 4;
01141                         if (iRunY < 0)
01142                         {
01143                               iRunY = 0;
01144                         }
01145                         else if (iRunY >= WORLD_COLS)
01146                         {
01147                               iRunY = WORLD_ROWS - 1;
01148                         }
01149                         break;
01150                   case 4:
01151                         iRunX = pSoldier->sX + Random( 9 ) - 4;
01152                         iRunY = WORLD_ROWS;
01153                         if (iRunX < 0)
01154                         {
01155                               iRunX = 0;
01156                         }
01157                         else if (iRunX >= WORLD_COLS)
01158                         {
01159                               iRunX = WORLD_COLS - 1;
01160                         }
01161                         break;
01162                   case 6:
01163                         iRunX = 0;
01164                         iRunY = pSoldier->sY + Random( 9 ) - 4;
01165                         if (iRunY < 0)
01166                         {
01167                               iRunY = 0;
01168                         }
01169                         else if (iRunY >= WORLD_COLS)
01170                         {
01171                               iRunY = WORLD_ROWS - 1;
01172                         }
01173                         break;
01174             }
01175             iRunGridNo = iRunX + iRunY * WORLD_COLS;
01176             if (LegalNPCDestination( pSoldier, (UINT16) iRunGridNo, ENSURE_PATH, TRUE,0))
01177             {
01178                   return( (UINT16) iRunGridNo );
01179             }
01180             // otherwise we'll try again another time
01181       }
01182       return( NOWHERE );
01183 }
01184 */
